src_original: puṇyakāmās tato 'nye ca paralokārthino 'pare // 185  icchāmy ahaṃ mahānātha mahābodhinayaṃ dṛḍham // 189
buddhaṃ dharmaṃ ca saṃghaṃ ca dehi me śaraṇatrayam  praveśayasva māṃ nātha mahāmokṣapuraṃ varam / 190
trir uccārya ca tān śiṣyān jñātvā sadbhaktivatsalān /  pradhānaṃ śiṣyam ekaṃ tu kṛtvā brūyād idaṃ vacaḥ // 191
ehi vatsa mahāyānaṃ mantracaryānayaṃ vidhim /  deśayiṣyāmi te samyak bhājanas tvaṃ mahānaye // 192
mantraprayogam atulaṃ yena bhagnaṃ mahābalam /  mārasainyaṃ mahāghoraṃ sākyasiṃhādibhir varaiḥ // 194
tasmān matim imāṃ vatsa kuru sarvajñatāptaye // 195
datte 'smai sarvabuddhebhyo dattaṃ bhavati śāśvatam // 391  adya vaḥ saphalaṃ janma yad asmin supratiṣṭhitāḥ /  samāḥ samayadevānāṃ bhavitā stha na saṃśayaḥ // 392
adya mārān vinirjitya praviṣṭāḥ paramaṃ puram /
jagati laghu sukhe 'dya vajrasattvapratisamaśāśvatatām gatā bhavantaḥ // 395
